BodyName: Committee on Women and Gender Equity

Items.Title: Resolution calling on the New York State Legislature to pass, and the Governor to sign, S2253-A654, which would repeal section 240.37 of the New York Penal Law, loitering for the purpose of engaging in a prostitution offense.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Loitering for the purpose of engaging in a prostitution offense. (S2253-A654)

Items.Title: Resolution calling on the New York State Legislature to pass, and the Governor to sign, a bill to amend the criminal procedure law to allow violations for Loitering for the Purpose of Engaging in a Prostitution Offense (PL ยง 240.37) to be sealed and have the law apply retroactively.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Allow violations for Loitering for the Purpose of Engaging in a Prostitution Offense (PL ยง 240.37) to be sealed and have the law apply retroactively.

Items.Title: Resolution calling on the New York State Legislature to pass, and the Governor to sign, S2253-A654, which would repeal section 240.37 of the New York Penal Law, loitering for the purpose of engaging in a prostitution offense.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: Loitering for the purpose of engaging in a prostitution offense. (S2253-A654)

Items.Title: Resolution calling on the New York State Legislature to pass, and the Governor to sign, a bill to amend the criminal procedure law to allow violations for Loitering for the Purpose of Engaging in a Prostitution Offense (PL ยง 240.37) to be sealed and have the law apply retroactively.

Items.MinutesNote: Other Council Members Attending: Rivera, Gibson and D. Diaz
